messages.message: @Serena Thanks for checking this out! The non-scrolling feels like a bug rather than a feature? Would we not want the page to scroll if the field is not currently in view (i.e. to centre the page on the extraction), instead of scrolling only if we are looking at a different page?

right now, i don't even think we center it on the extracted thing; we bring it to the top of doc viewer right? i think we can make it so that it always centers it, whether or not it's currently in view

We could make this change, weâ€™ve just never gotten around to this before for Build

(i _think_ this behavior already exists in commercial/enterprise Human Review)
